get.description: Update the selling price of a domain. There are no restrictions for Standard Listings. For Premium Listings, the selling price must be within the allowed range as per your Membership Tier (e.g. Silver, Gold, Platinum)

get.description: Search for trademarks in the USPTO database based on keyword and various filters. Requires dedicated Trademark API token.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: Trademark API token (dedicated for trademark functionality)

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for in trademark names

parameters.name: class
parameters.description: International class filter (e.g., ‘009’ for computer software)

get.description: Get an AI-powered appraisal for a domain including estimated price, domain score, key signals, and root words. Accepts either dedicated Appraisal API token OR Seller API token with atom_seller=1 permission.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: API Key (Appraisal API token OR Seller API token with atom_seller=1 permission)

get.description: Search for domain names using AI-powered semantic search with embeddings and Pinecone. This API creates embeddings for natural language queries and finds semantically similar domains.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: API Key to get the details.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Natural language search query (e.g., 'tech startup names’, ‘healthcare companies’) Example: tech startup names

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: Optional filters to apply to the search (JSON string)

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination (default: 1). Default value: 1. Example: 1

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Number of results per page (default: 20, max: 100). Default value: 20. Example: 20

get.description: Get domains that were approved on a specific date. Returns domains with status ‘Approved’ or ‘Seller Approved’ (with dns_checked != 0) where approved_date matches the specified date.

parameters.name: api_token
parameters.description: API Key to get the details.

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format to get listings for Example: 2025-07-21

parameters.name: listing_type
parameters.description: Filter by listing type. ‘Curated’ returns only Approved status domains. ‘All’ returns both Approved and Seller Approved domains. Default value: All
